short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use your Smart Cards on Chrome OS. Supports US Gov PIV, US DoD CAC, BeID, PKCS15, IAS, SafeNet, CardOS, etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DriveLock SmartCard Middleware (CSSI) is the enterprise class smart card middleware solution from DriveLock SE, available on Windows, Mac OS, Linux and on Chrome OS. DriveLock SmartCard Middleware has been validated FIPS 201 compliant by NIST, and supports the following cards/profiles:
US government PIV card
PIV compliant variants
Belgian identity card (BeID card)
YubiKey CCID device
Thales (SafeNet) EToken
CardOS up to 5.3
IAS
Drivelock corporate & PKCS15 profiles

With DriveLock SmartCard Middleware for Chrome OS, you can use your smart card to connect to any HTTPS secured web site that accepts the client certificate on your card.

DriveLock SmartCard Middleware requires the installation of the Google's Smart Card Connector app to connect to any CCID compatible smart card reader.
